trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** de un <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegado se define para la <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> eventos de la <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> clase.

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Puede tener acceso a la <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> eventos de la <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> clase especificando una subrutina denominada **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** en el archivo Global.asax de la aplicación ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento se produce durante la <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> construye una <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> uso actual del objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> y lo pasa a la **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> objeto proporcionado a la **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para establecer el <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propiedad del elemento actual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> a una personalizada <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Si no especifica un valor para el <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propiedad durante la **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** se utiliza el evento, la identidad proporcionada por el vale de autenticación de formularios en la cookie o una dirección URL.

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: El **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento es solo se genera cuando la autenticación <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> y el <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> es un módulo HTTP activo para la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object with a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo de código utiliza el **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para establecer el <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propiedad del elemento actual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> a una <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> objeto con un personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
